(I thought K9 was a German shepherd.)

"Good then I guess we have an understanding." Phobia liked these odds 
but still wanted to rise the stakes a little. he pressed his Predacon 
symbol and the rear hatch of the ship opened. "If you would be so 
kind as to step inside we will talk." Phobia paused to let the 
maximal think for a moment. "Or we could resume this senseless battle 
at full power."

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> DrillBit forgot all about the attack. He held KitKat close, and
> continued the kiss.
> 
> ::K9::
> 
> K9 heard Phobia over the comm. He replyed.
> "Ok, lets talk. Beast mode!" He tranformed, to golden retrever mode.
